alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:16AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...STRONG ATMOSPHERIC RIVER WILL BRING IMPACTS TO THE BASIN AND RANGE THROUGH MID WEEK... * A potent Atmospheric River storm will continue to impact the region through Tuesday. This system will bring copious amounts of moisture with periods of rain and snow. Rain will transition to snow later today and tonight with possible impacts to the evening and Tuesday morning commute. The greatest snowfall accumulations outside of the higher terrain will be west of Highway 95 near Fernley, Silver Springs, and Nixon where up to 2 inches are possible. Elevations above 5000 feet, including the upper sections of USA Parkway, may receive up to 4 inches of total snowfall from late tonight through Tuesday. * While winds are not expected to cause major travel disruptions, gusty and choppy conditions will be possible on Pyramid Lake each day and boaters should exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
